compile_application(params = {})

Compile the given Flex/AIR application The following options are supported: 

    :executable => 'mxmlc'
    :application => nil
    :destination => 'public/bin'
    :opts => nil
    :flex_root => 'app/flex'

[ show source ]

    # File lib/restfulx/tasks.rb, line 18
18:   def compile_application(params = {})
19:     project_name, flex_project_name, command_controller_name, base_package, base_folder, 
20:       flex_root = extract_names()
21:     
22:     executable = params[:executable] || 'mxmlc'
23:     application = params[:application] || get_main_application
24:     destination = params[:destination] || 'public/bin'
25:     opts = params[:opts] || ''
26:     flex_root = params[:flex_root] || flex_root
27:     
28:     compiler = get_executable(executable)
29:     
30:     application = get_main_application unless application
31:     project_path = File.join(APP_ROOT, flex_root, application)
32:     target_project_path = project_path.sub(/.mxml$/, '.swf')
33:     target_project_air_descriptor = project_path.sub(/.mxml$/, '-app.xml')
34:       
35:     libs = Dir.glob(File.join(APP_ROOT, 'lib', '*.swc')).map {|lib| lib.gsub(' ', '\ ')}
36:       
37:     additional_compiler_args = 
38:       get_app_properties().elements["actionScriptProperties"].elements["compiler"].attributes["additionalCompilerArguments"]
39:     additional_compiler_args.gsub!("../locale/", "#{APP_ROOT}/app/locale/")
40:     
41:     cmd = "#{executable} #{opts} -library-path+=#{libs.join(',')} " << additional_compiler_args << " #{project_path.gsub(' ', '\ ')}"
42:     puts "Compiling #{project_path}"
43:     if system(cmd)
44:       FileUtils.makedirs File.join(APP_ROOT, destination)
45:       puts "Moving #{target_project_path} to " + File.join(APP_ROOT, destination)
46:       FileUtils.mv target_project_path, File.join(APP_ROOT, destination), :force => true
47:       if File.exist?(target_project_air_descriptor)
48:         descriptor = File.read(target_project_air_descriptor)
49:         descriptor_name = target_project_air_descriptor.split("/").last
50:         app_swf = target_project_path.split("/").last
51:         descriptor.gsub!("[This value will be overwritten by Flex Builder in the output app.xml]", 
52:           app_swf)
53: 
54:         File.open("#{APP_ROOT}/#{destination}/#{descriptor_name}", "w") do |file|
55:           file.print descriptor
56:         end
57:         puts "Created #{APP_ROOT}/#{destination}/#{descriptor_name} descriptor."
58:       end
59:       puts 'Done!'
60:     else
61:       puts "The application was not compiled. Check console for errors. " <<
62:         "It is possible that '(a)mxmlc' executable was not found or there are compilation errors."
63:     end
64:   end

    # File lib/restfulx/tasks.rb, line 66
66:   def run_air_application(params = {})
67:     application = params[:application] || get_main_application
68:     descriptor = params[:descriptor] || application.sub(/.mxml$/, '-app.xml')
69:     destination = params[:destination] || 'bin-debug'
70:     
71:     puts "Running AIR application with descriptor: #{descriptor}"
72:     if !system("#{get_executable('adl')} #{destination}/#{descriptor}")
73:       puts "Could not run the application with descriptor: #{destination}/#{descriptor}. Check console for errors."
74:     end
75:   end
